divs: Sighting DetailsWas outside and saw a blinking light between the trees. Looked closer and saw an object hovering that started out a white light then started to blink in red, green and blue. A red light shot out of it. It moved very slowly to the right taking about 20 minutes where it went behind the trees and we could not see it anymore. It was too far away to record or photograph.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Springtown
There were no other sightings in Springtown on or around August 21st 2011
Summary: Saw unknown object in Northwestern sky over Springtown
